author: Aldo Zilli
method: Heat the oil in a pan and fry the garlic and chilli for 1-2 minutes, or until softened. Add the cooked linguine to the pan and toss to coat, then stir in the basil leaves. To serve, place the linguine onto a serving plate.
ingredients: 3 tbsp olive oil,  2 garlic cloves, finely chopped,  1 red chilli, chopped,  200g/7oz dried linguine, cooked according to packet instructions,  6 fresh basil leaves, torn
